name: ALICE AND THE CLOCK OF INFINITY
name_original: ALICE AND THE CLOCK OF INFINITY
description:
What is it?

This game has online highscores! Please accept internet access!

"Alice and the clock of infinity" is an Alice in wonderland themed rythm game.

Cool, and why?

Created for SAE online game jam 2020.

All UX, art, code and music (except libs) were made in the one week game jam period.

UX and Code by Jan Lygnos

Art, Music and Soundtrack by Thalia Darkow

#SAEHamburg
